DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is: To evaluate the safety and performance of the Presillion stent in routine clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Postmarket Surveillance Registry Evaluating Performance and Long Term Safety of the Presillion Stent
DOC.detailed_description: Primary endpoint: Composite of Major Adverse Cardiac Events (MACE), which includes cardiac death, myocardial infarction (Q-wave and non Q-wave) and clinically driven target lesion revascularization (TLR) at 12 months follow-up. Data will be collected on 400 patients (from 14 hospitals in Spain and Portugal) treated with the Presillion stent in up to 2 de novo native coronary artery lesions Study design: multicenter, prospective, observational
DOC.criteria: All subjects treated with Presillion stent up to two de novo coronary artery lesions No specified
